articles.title: Prepare now for Putin to cut off gas supply, Europe warned - live updates - The Telegraph
articles.description: Europe has been urged to prepare for a complete cutting off of Russian gas supplies as the continent’s energy crisis deepens.
articles.content:
Good morning. 
There's no let-up in the latest inflation figures, which hit a new 40-year high in May.
The consumer price index rose to 9.1pc last month, according to the ONS. That's up from 9pc a … [+2121 chars]

articles.title: Germany could break ranks with Europe on petrol and diesel car ban - Drive
articles.description: Germany’s Finance Minister has rejected a proposal to ban internal combustion-engined cars, arguing for the development of synthetic fuels. A senior
articles.content: No matter how noble the motives are, we have no way of knowing whether there are still options for technologies, such as synthetic fuels, which no-one has on the agenda today, but could come back int… [+87 chars]

articles.title: European Tour returns to Singapore in 2023, first time in 9 years - CNA
articles.description: SINGAPORE: The DP World Tour will return to Singapore in 2023 for the first time in nine years, as the golf organisation beefs up its Asian footprint, it said on Tuesday (Jun 21).
articles.content:
SINGAPORE: The DP World Tour will return to Singapore in 2023 for the first time in nine years, as the golf organisation beefs up its Asian footprint, it said on Tuesday (Jun 21).
